text: (relaxing pop music)
- My name is Kelly Labrador,
I'm located in Paris

as a Client Capability
Lead at DXC Technology.
I am the first point of contact

for my customers inside
of our organization

and taking care of their
technical requests,
and my responsibility is to ensure

that the service delivered by
our technical teams are met.
I have a master degree in economics

and a postgraduate degree
in business administration.

I decided to go to the cloud
because my company start
massive public cloud training program.
I start my training by taking
online AWS cloud practitioner training.

Then I followed by five
days online training
on architecting on AWS.

I finally took the AWS Certified
Solution Architect exam
in January, 2019.
I was recertified in 2022.
Preparing for an exam takes time

and you need the endurance
to achieve your goal.
Getting my certificate made me proud
and given me more confidence
in my ability to learn outside of school.

So preparing for my AWS
certification has given me

a better understanding of
the need of our customers.

Training in the cloud AWS
provide me with a knowledge base

and skillset that made
me eligible candidate
for future assignment in my company.
After getting my certification,

I had the opportunity to work
as a technical project manager
on the AWS cloud migration project
for one of our insurance clients.
My skills allow me to contribute

to the successful deployment
of this application.
(soft acoustic music)
